name: Fiizy Pay Later Multi-lender Payment Gateway for WooCommerce
author: Fiizy Financing Services SL

sections.description:
Fiizy allows your customers to slice up the payment on their purchases, by enabling them to find the matching financing option. The multiple number of lenders will increase the options of getting financed, which means more happy customers.

What this module does for you

Fiizy BNPL Multilender Payment Gateway allows you to make easier shopping for the customer, by offering one of the most desired flexible payment options currently, and at the same time securing all your payments right after the purchase.
Also, Fiizy BNPL Multilender will enhance your sales and increase the AOV, providing security to the customer through its transparency and security.
Open a new door to a younger and more engaged audience with this trustworthy and flexible payment method, will provide you a longer term relationship with the customer and results on a longer time frame.

  • Your customer will have access to network of financial institutions. This grants up to 70% higher probability of your customers to get financing for their purchase
  • Approval rates up to 80% (vs existing 40%)
  • Sales increase by up to 30%
  • Average Order Value increase by up to 30%
  • Frictionless checkout experience
  • No dependency on a single financing provider
  • Deferred payment options for international shoppers
  • Omnichannel – BNPL solution for both online and in-store purchases
  • Increased loyalty & recurring customers
  • Easy setup and onboarding

Features

Buy Now, Pay Later
Fiizy is a Buy Now, Pay Later solution for your shoppers. We enable your shoppers to pay using interest free installment payments over the course of 3-18 months.

Increased Conversions
Shoppers that see the Fiizy widget that show’s the possibility to pay in instalments are more engaged, more likely to add items to their cart, and ultimately more likely to convert their cart into an order.

Even More Increased Conversions
With Fiizy’s multi-lender solution, event more consumers are approved for financing!

Alternative Payment Option
Fiizy is a payment option that your shoppers will see alongside other payment methods in your checkout page. Offering more options for shoppers to pay can help you achieve more sales.

What your customers will like

  • Multi-lender solution offers more possibilities to get financing over single-lender solutions
  • Flexible, personalised monthly instalments for most profiles
  • Market leading loan rates
  • 100% online, paperless process
  • Exceptional user experience
  • Instant loan decision
sections.installation:
To use the plugin you need a Fiizy Business account.
Create an account

Automatic Installation

  • Search for the ‘Fiizy Pay Later Multi-lender Payment Gateway for WooCommerce’ plugin via ‘Add New’ from the WordPress menu
  • Press the ‘Install now’ button

Manual Installation

  • Download the plugin from the WordPress Plugin Directory
  • Unzip the downloaded file to a local directory
  • Upload the directory ‘woocommerce-fiizy’ to /wp-content/plugins/ on the remote server

Configuration

  • Activate the ‘Fiizy Pay Later Multi-lender Payment Gateway for WooCommerce’ plugin via ‘Plugin’ from the WordPress menu
